_sText:
...:::APOCALYPSE:::...
-=Version 2=-
Map name: de_apocalypse
Author: Rok3 Overlord
Assistant: ISPE Hrastopw
Map type: BombSite - Fully Themed
Max players: 32
Weapons: BuyZone

.....................................................
STORY
A terrorist team has taken over na abandon desert research facillty, witch was
based on researching high rahiation levels. The facillity was abandon after a 
apocalyptic disaster nearly 20 years ago, when high raditation waves leaked out 
of the safehold labs, and killed everyone in the facillity at the time. The 
terrorists are now trying to achive that deadly level of raditation, but with a 
much wider radius. US CT units are allready on the way.

Instalation
1. Copy the "maps" folder to C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\YOUR ACCOUNT\counter-strike source\cstrike\
2. Run the game, and the map will appear in your maplist when creating a server.
3. Enjoy!

WHATS NEW IN VERSION 2:
-The Lab room is now Bigger.
-The roof is edited.
-The first flor and the roof are connected with a ladder.
-Some weapons are placed in the map.

Notes
Bots can't use the push-type doors wich I used in the map so playing with bots won't be as fun as it should be.

Conntact
eMail & MSN Messenger: rokslofs@hotmail.com
Home Page: http://fzone.kicks-ass.org/forum/

Spread and enjoy the map!
